'''''Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 19 June 2012''''' is an auction catalogue from Christie's. The catalogue includes the following sales of letters by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]:

*Lot 252: letter from Tolkien to Elena Jeronimides (see [[Letter to Elena Jeronimides]]).
*Lot 251: letter from Tolkien to Roger Verhulst (see [[Letter to Roger Verhulst (9 March 1966)]]).<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.christies.com/lotfinder/books-manuscripts/tolkien-john-ronald-reuel-typed-letter-5578691-details.aspx?from=searchresults&intObjectID=5578691&sid=808ae394-3ce7-4475-8e9c-d5db92dc6fd4|articlename=Sale 6237/Lot 252|dated=|website=[http://www.christies.com/ Christie's.com]|accessed=19 June 2012}}</ref>
